sys_ui_page.html:
var catItemId; var ecString; var gr2 = new GlideRecordSecure('sc_cat_item'); gr2.addQuery('sys_scope.name', 'Digital Certificate Organizer'); gr2.query(); while(gr2.next()){ catItemId = gr2.sys_id; } ecString = "cat_item.sys_id="+catItemId; var gr3 = new GlideRecordSecure('item_option_new'); gr3.addEncodedQuery(ecString); gr3.addQuery('type','NOT IN','12,20,24,19,11,14,17') gr3.addQuery('name', '!=','country'); gr3.addQuery('name','!=','use_case'); gr3.addQuery('name','!=', 'csr_contents_city'); gr3.addQuery('name','!=', 'assigned_ci'); gr3.addQuery('name','!=', 'attributes_values'); gr3.addQuery('name','!=', 'automatic_renewal'); gr3.addQuery('name','!=', 'certificate_authority'); gr3.addQuery('name','!=', 'certificate_folder'); gr3.addQuery('name','!=', 'certificate_validity'); gr3.addQuery('name','!=', 'common_name'); gr3.addQuery('name','!=', 'contacts'); gr3.addQuery('name','!=', 'csr_generation'); gr3.addQuery('name','!=', 'description_nous'); gr3.addQuery('name','!=', 'enter_csr'); gr3.addQuery('name','!=', 'hash_algorithm'); gr3.addQuery('name','!=', 'hash_algorithm_old'); gr3.addQuery('name','!=', 'management_type'); gr3.addQuery('name','!=', 'management_type_old'); gr3.addQuery('name','!=', 'nickname'); gr3.addQuery('name','!=', 'key_strength'); gr3.addQuery('name','!=', 'key_strength_old'); gr3.addQuery('name','!=', 'management_type_old'); gr3.addQuery('name','!=', 'specify_end_date'); gr3.addQuery('name','!=', 'requested_for'); gr3.addQuery('name','!=', 'email'); gr3.addQuery('name','!=', 'dns'); gr3.addQuery('name','!=', 'uri'); gr3.addQuery('name','!=', 'ip'); gr3.addQuery('name','!=', 'upn'); gr3.addQuery('name','!=', 'subject_alternative_names_email'); gr3.addQuery('name','!=', 'subject_alternative_names_dns'); gr3.addQuery('name','!=', 'subject_alternative_names_ip'); gr3.addQuery('name','!=', 'subject_alternative_names_upn'); gr3.addQuery('name','!=', 'subject_alternative_names_uri'); gr3.addQuery('name','!=', 'country'); gr3.orderBy('name'); gr3.query(); gr3;

Certificate Request Default Values

These default values are populated from Venafi, changing the values might impact the process.

$[SP]

var isChecked = gs.getProperty('x_nouin_nousvenafi.default_'+ gr3.name); isChecked; var cntry = new GlideRecordSecure('core_country'); cntry.query(); cntry; var selectCountry = gs.getProperty('x_nouin_nousvenafi.default_country'); selectCountry;
